creator: Dean Webb
descriptionHtml:
Want to learn how to speak, read and write in Mandarin, the most spoken language in the world? Want to improve and hone in on your skills to help progress your learning? Want to have a fun learning experience that can you heavily customise to suit your own needs? Well with Rose you have have all of that!

Mandarin can be one of the most challenging languages to learn, needing a lot of commitment and plenty of revision in order to become an expert at it. That is why Rose has been specifically crafted to deal with the challenges that come with learning the language, in order to give you the best environment to work with!

Everyone learns in different ways, so you will need plenty of different options to choose from. Whether you like to match English to Chinese or choose from a selection of options to test your memory, build words and phrases using components to further help you understand meaning behind words, or type out some Pinyin to get the right tone. Here you can do it all and more, either separately, all together, or as a mix, so that you will never forget again!

If you think there is not enough game modes for you, do not worry. Maybe you want to play a competitive game with your family or friends, or you wish to gamify your learning experience with whole new game modes that will allow for you to learn whilst are playing a game. Well with Rose you can! By earning points as you learn, or by spending real world currency, you will be able to choose from a large selection of game modes that will keep you busy and entertained as you challenge yourself to further improve your skills!

But learning is not all that is important, you also want to be able to track your learning. By being able to see what your strongest and weakest words and phrases are, you will be able to customise your learning so that you can practice and improve on these, allowing for you to perfect your skills. You can also see other details, including how much you have got correct and how many minutes you have spent learning, for any given day, allowing you to set your own goals that will best suit you!

However, in order to get the best learning experience for yourself, you will need for it to be perfect for you. Perhaps there are categories that you do not need to learn, or you want to focus on a certain list of words and phrases, such as new ones that you have not learnt yet, or a list that you have formed for yourself. Well now you can with Rose! You can even choose whether or not you want to use English, Pinyin or Characters when learning, the amount of questions that you will be asked, and the amount of options that you will have to choose from, allowing for you to adjust the difficult to best fit you!

Learning can be difficult sometimes without the right motivation. That is why Rose comes with a world for you to care for! By using the points that you earn whilst you learn, you will be able to grow and care for your bears. They will need water to drink, food to eat and places to sleep. In an ever expanding world, there will always be things for you to check back up on and for you to spend your points on, motivating you to learn more!

With Rose, you can learn wherever and whenever you want, with no internet being required. So why not give Rose a try today and become the master of your own learning!
descriptionShort: Learn Mandarin the way you want with this fun customisable language app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed issue leading to pinyin order being wrong in Words menu.
Fixed bug with certain words causing Learning Mode to freeze.

Changed multiple things, including:
No longer allows single character words for Pinyin in PassWord.
Updated card selection menu for Word Typer.

Also added:
More options to Order submenu in Words menu.
Added "Remove Component and Meaningless Words" button to Words menu.
Added ability to sync Words menu and card selection menu.

descriptionShort: Learn Mandarin the way you want with this fun customisable language app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Bear items now change to correct lighting in World.

Changed multiple things, including:
Text information altered for tool profiles in World to be clearer.

Also added:
Ability to move and hold tools in World.
Workbenches into Inventory menu in World.

Various bug fixes, including:

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed bug that prevented Bear tasks from happening.
Fixed bug that made Bears face the wrong way on spawn.

Also added:
Added tasks to allow Bears to Chop-Wood and Mine-Stone.
Tools now have durability which will destroy the tool when it reaches zero.
Trees and Rocks can now be destroyed when Chopping/Mining.
Added availability to more countries.
Current build information to start-up loading screen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Non-HSK level is now being correctly given to Words with multiple meanings, in which one does not have an HSK level.

Changed multiple things, including:
Adjusted wording on cards in Card Menu.
Combined words that were sharing the same pinyin and hanzi.
Removed several unnecessary or incorrect words.
Altered several words.

Added various features, including:
Added availability to more countries.
Finished adding the rest of the words for Level 1 in HSK 3.0.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed bug causing Meteorites' and Asteroids' menus to not load properly.

Added various features, including:
Added availability to more countries.
Added a Help Menu in order to explain what the menus and buttons are used for.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed bug causing Word Typer not to load.

Changed multiple things, including:
Changed how revise works for words, now altering the amount of time between revising depending on how correct/incorrect rate.

Added various features, including:
Added ability for game to decide words from the themes and levels chosen when starting a game mode in order to make the words more connected.

Maybe you want to play a competitive game with your family or friends, or you wish to gamify your learning experience with whole new game modes that will allow for you to learn whilst are playing a game. Well with Rose you can! By earning points as you learn, or by spending real world currency, you will be able to choose from a large selection of game modes that will keep you busy and entertained as you challenge yourself to further improve your skills!

But learning is not all that is important, you also want to be able to track your learning. By being able to see what your strongest and weakest words and phrases are, you will be able to customise your learning so that you can practice and improve on these, allowing for you to perfect your skills. You can also see other details, including how much you have got correct and how many minutes you have spent learning, for any given day, allowing you to set your own goals that will best suit you!

However, in order to get the best learning experience for yourself, you will need for it to be perfect for you. Perhaps there are categories that you do not need to learn, or you want to focus on a certain list of words and phrases, such as new ones that you have not learnt yet, or a list that you have formed for yourself. Well now you can with Rose! You can even choose whether or not you want to use English, Pinyin or Characters when learning, the amount of questions that you will be asked, and the amount of options that you will have to choose from, allowing for you to adjust the difficult to best fit you!

Learning can be difficult sometimes without the right motivation. That is why Rose comes with a world for you to care for! By using the points that you earn whilst you learn, you will be able to grow and care for your bears. They will need water to drink, food to eat and places to sleep. In an ever expanding world, there will always be things for you to check back up on and for you to spend your points on, motivating you to learn more!

With Rose, you can learn wherever and whenever you want, with no internet being required. So why not give Rose a try today and become the master of your own learning!
descriptionShort: Learn Chinese the way you want with this fun customisable language app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed bugs in Learning Mode with Card Match and Card Pair modes.

Changed multiple things, including:
Improved word selection in Learning Mode.

title: Rose

creator: Dean Webb
descriptionHtml:
Want to learn how to speak, read and write in Chinese, the most spoken language in the world? Want to improve and hone in on your skills to help progress your learning? Want to have a fun learning experience that can you heavily customise to suit your own needs? Well with Rose you have have all of that!

Chinese can be one of the most challenging languages to learn, needing a lot of commitment and plenty of revision in order to become an expert at it. descriptionHtml:
Want to learn how to speak, read and write in Chinese, the most spoken language in the world? Want to improve and hone in on your skills to help progress your learning? Want to have a fun learning experience that can you heavily customise to suit your own needs? Well with Rose you have have all of that!

Chinese can be one of the most challenging languages to learn, needing a lot of commitment and plenty of revision in order to become an expert at it. That is why Rose has been specifically crafted to deal with the challenges that come with learning the language, in order to give you the best environment to work with!

Everyone learns in different ways, so you will need plenty of different options to choose from. Whether you like to match English to Chinese or choose from a selection of options to test your memory, build words and phrases using components to further help you understand meaning behind words, or type out some Pinyin to get the right tone. Here you can do it all and more, either separately, all together, or as a mix, so that you will never forget again!

If you think there is not enough game modes for you, do not worry. Maybe you want to play a competitive game with your family or friends, or you wish to gamify your learning experience with whole new game modes that will allow for you to learn whilst are playing a game. Well with Rose you can! By earning points as you learn, or by spending real world currency, you will be able to choose from a large selection of game modes that will keep you busy and entertained as you challenge yourself to further improve your skills!

But learning is not all that is important, you also want to be able to track your learning. By being able to see what your strongest and weakest words and phrases are, you will be able to customise your learning so that you can practice and improve on these, allowing for you to perfect your skills. You can also see other details, including how much you have got correct and how many minutes you have spent learning, for any given day, allowing you to set your own goals that will best suit you!

However, in order to get the best learning experience for yourself, you will need for it to be perfect for you. Perhaps there are categories that you do not need to learn, or you want to focus on a certain list of words and phrases, such as new ones that you have not learnt yet, or a list that you have formed for yourself. Well now you can with Rose! You can even choose whether or not you want to use English, Pinyin or Characters when learning, the amount of questions that you will be asked, and the amount of options that you will have to choose from, allowing for you to adjust the difficult to best fit you!

Learning can be difficult sometimes without the right motivation. That is why Rose comes with a world for you to care for! By using the points that you earn whilst you learn, you will be able to grow and care for your bears. They will need water to drink, food to eat and places to sleep. In an ever expanding world, there will always be things for you to check back up on and for you to spend your points on, motivating you to learn more!

With Rose, you can learn wherever and whenever you want, with no internet being required. So why not give Rose a try today and become the master of your own learning!
descriptionShort: Learn Chinese the way you want with this fun customisable language app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed several bugs causing Game Modes to not load.

Added various features, including:
Added beginning stages of colour schemes for languages.

title: Rose

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed bug with exiting Tutorial being unable to return back in certain scenarios.

Changed multiple things, including:
Adjusted some Game Modes' Header information text.
Adjusted some Tutorial text.

Added various features, including:
Further expanded on and added to Tutorials.
Added visual display of Tutorial blockers to help know where to click.
Added help information for Tutorial.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Various bug fixes, including:
Fixed display issues with arrows in the Learning Mode menu.
Fixed bug that happened when removing items from World.
Fixed bug with Learning Mode and its modes.

Changed multiple things, including:
Adjusted Help and Tutorials text.
Removed ads at end of Game Modes if five Game Modes have been unlocked.
Removed banners and adjusted displays that used them.

Added various features, including:
Finish adding Tutorials.
Added Zhuyin display option for Traditional Chinese.
